original_title: Chuck Berry & Bo Diddley: Rock 'n' Roll All Star Jam
overview: In 1985, Bo Diddley put together a band that included Ron Wood, John Mayall, Mick Fleetwood, Kenny Jones, Carmine Appice, John Lodge, Ronnie Lane, Carl Wilson, and members of the Jimi Hendrix Experience, Chicago, Quiet Riot, and Three Dog Night. He cooked them all a barbecue dinner, and then they put on a show. It's a 55-minute Rand B jamfest.
title: Chuck Berry & Bo Diddley: Rock 'n' Roll All Star Jam
